mosinstall.name: Who's Online
mosinstall.author: Mambo Project
mosinstall.description: The Who's Online module displays the number of anonymous (that is, Guest) users and Registered users, (those that are logged in) that are currently accessing the web site.

param.name: stat_time
param.label: 统计时间间隔(秒)
param.description: 用户在线情况统计时间间隔，默认为300秒，即5分钟

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: 模块css后缀
param.description: 用来定义模块的css类型(table.moduletable)的后缀，这样允许模块使用单独的css风格
